com.android.server

Class Watchdog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.android.server.Watchdog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Watchdog
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class calls its monitor every minute. Killing this process if they don't return
